event: Early Tibeto-Burman communities settle Himalayan valleys
Kirat kingdoms dominate eastern Himalayan regions
Licchavi dynasty establishes urban state culture
Nepal becomes a trans-Himalayan trade corridor
Malla kingdoms foster art, architecture, and city-states
Prithvi Narayan Shah unifies modern Nepal
Treaty of Sugauli limits Nepalese territorial expansion
Rana dynasty establishes hereditary autocratic rule
Rana regime ends and monarchy restored
Nepal abolishes monarchy and becomes a republic
